subject: Re: [junit] Re: Bertrand Meyer's approach (Contract-Driven Development)
msgSnippet: ... Severe agreement. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603 Let s write software that people
messageBody:
David Vydra wrote:

> Ok, lets say I like DbC. What tools should I use in Java? I use Eclipse.
> Will my refactorings be propagated to those tools?
> What if I have lots of assertions and invariants, how do I organize them?
> Tool support is often an important issue in adoption of new technologies.

Severe agreement.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
